OrgName.entry: CZECH AND SLOVAK FAMILIES GROUP IN SHEFFIELD

Desc.entry: A voluntary networking and information sharing group enabling established families to support new arrivals whilst retaining a sense of cultural belonging through the development of bi-lingual skills for children and adults. The group meet every 3rd Saturday in the month in the sheffield 8 area. All details about the place and time are available on request through the Facebook group "Czech and Slovak Families in Sheffield", or by email.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Monthly (in the S8 area), please contact for details
